frontmatter.announcement: Announcing EIP-712 support! See our mobile and library release notes https://developer.uport.me/releases for details.

node.name: v1.1.4 Update did-jwt
node.description: - Upgrade to latest version of did-jwt

node.name: v1.1.3 Fix for CallBack
node.description:
- Callbackurl has been added as a parameter in createVerification method
- rpcUrl has been added as a parameter in createDisclosureRequest method to support private chains
- upgrade to latest version of did-jwt
